languages.text: "Не отрицай, что ты не умеешь наслаждаться болью других — иначе зачем ты с таким огнем взирал{mf||а} на меня, охваченного мукой агонатора?" {n}Маражай негромко смеется.{/n}
"Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не отрицай, что ты не умеешь наслаждаться болью других — иначе зачем ты с таким огнем взирал{mf||а} на меня, охваченного мукой агонатора?" {n}Маражай негромко смеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}
"Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}
"Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}
"Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

languages.text: “不要否认，你也同样可以陶醉在别人的痛苦之中。当初，你充满激情地凝视着我，任凭折磨之鞭的爱抚，不就是因为这个吗？”{n}玛拉斋轻声笑了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不要否认，你也同样可以陶醉在别人的痛苦之中。当初，你充满激情地凝视着我，任凭折磨之鞭的爱抚，不就是因为这个吗？”{n}玛拉斋轻声笑了起来。{/n}

languages.text: 「否定するな。お前も他人の痛みを楽しめるはずだ。アゴナイザーによる拷問で俺がのたうち回っていた時、お前が熱っぽい目で俺を見てたのはそのせいだろ？」{n}マラズハイは静かに笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「否定するな。お前も他人の痛みを楽しめるはずだ。アゴナイザーによる拷問で俺がのたうち回っていた時、お前が熱っぽい目で俺を見てたのはそのせいだろ？」{n}マラズハイは静かに笑う。{/n}

languages.text: «No lo niegues... tú también puedes disfrutar con el dolor ajeno. ¿No fue por eso que tus ojos ardían al contemplarme a merced de las torturas del agonizador?». {n}Marazhai ríe suavemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No lo niegues... tú también puedes disfrutar con el dolor ajeno. ¿No fue por eso que tus ojos ardían al contemplarme a merced de las torturas del agonizador?». {n}Marazhai ríe suavemente.{/n}

languages.text: « Ne le niez pas ; vous aussi, vous vous délectez de la souffrance des autres. J'ai vu la flamme dans vos yeux lorsque vous me regardiez me débattre dans les affres du neurocide. » {n}Marazhai se met à rire doucement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ne le niez pas ; vous aussi, vous vous délectez de la souffrance des autres. J'ai vu la flamme dans vos yeux lorsque vous me regardiez me débattre dans les affres du neurocide. » {n}Marazhai se met à rire doucement.{/n}

languages.text: "Leugnet es nicht – auch Ihr seid dazu in der Lage, Euch im Schmerz anderer zu suhlen. Haben Eure Augen nicht deswegen so gefunkelt, als Ihr mir dabei zugesehen habt, wie ich den Qualen des Peinigers ausgesetzt war?" {n}Marazhai lacht leicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Leugnet es nicht – auch Ihr seid dazu in der Lage, Euch im Schmerz anderer zu suhlen. Haben Eure Augen nicht deswegen so gefunkelt, als Ihr mir dabei zugesehen habt, wie ich den Qualen des Peinigers ausgesetzt war?" {n}Marazhai lacht leicht.{/n}

languages.text: "İnkâr etme. Sen de diğerlerinin acısından zevk duyabilirsin. Kıvrandıranın çektirdiği eziyetin merhametine sığındığında bana odaklanan gözlerinde gördüğüm alevin nedeni de bu değil miydi?" {n}Marazhai, hafif bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not deny it — you too can revel in the pain of others. Isn't that why your eyes burned as you gazed upon me at the mercy of the agoniser's torment?" {n}Marazhai laughs softly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İnkâr etme. Sen de diğerlerinin acısından zevk duyabilirsin. Kıvrandıranın çektirdiği eziyetin merhametine sığındığında bana odaklanan gözlerinde gördüğüm alevin nedeni de bu değil miydi?" {n}Marazhai, hafif bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n}
